Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: @Sri the thing is, if your exchange has KMD or any other asset chain, they will need to upgrade that anyway, it's just a scam to charge. Some exchanges do it to Hush as well, but we haven't paid them anything. It's a tough call

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: some exchanges want to charge for every asset chain + KMD to update, when it's just KMD repo they need to update. It's a total scam, *cough* digitalprice.io *cough*

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: $500 per AC, for nothing

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: to literally stop and restart the daemon

Author: Sri#6686
Content: Digital Price is still affordable Duke üòÉ think of 0.5 BTC

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: i've dealt with this via BTCH a bit, and HUSH too

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: they want to charge for every update, we said no thanks

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: and they wont' update to DPoW unless we pay, so they run insecure old code

Author: Sri#6686
Content: They take weeks to reply to support email, let alone updating nodes

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: the next Hush update will disconnect from old non-dpow insecure nodes, exchanges will need to deal with it. I don't support writing free open source code and being charged for every update

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: It goes against my being. I would rather leave cryptocoins entirely before I do that

Author: Sri#6686
Content: Makes sense.
